context_of_use: This use case allows users to view and download sales and other reports for analysis and offline use.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to analyze reports for personal use
user: wants to analyze data offline
admin: wants to monitor business performance
description: Allows users to view and download sales and other reports for analysis and offline use.
triggering_event: User requests to view or download reports.
preconditions: User has permission to access reports.
postconditions: User successfully views or downloads the requested reports.
assumptions: Users have the necessary permissions to access the reports.
Reports are available in the system for viewing and downloading.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to view reports.
The system shall allow users to download reports.
outstanding_issues: Need to define the types of reports available for viewing and downloading.
main_flow: 1. Customer/user/admin requests to view reports → System displays available reports.
2. Customer/user/admin selects a report to download → System initiates the download process.
3. Customer/user/admin confirms the download → System completes the download and notifies the user.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If no reports are available, then the system displays a message indicating that no reports are found.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the download fails, then the system displays an error message and suggests retrying.
